messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Who want to me and my freindys  make a bunker on  cargo to protect us from  anything say yes  if you dont like this  say no

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: We have a huge fucking issue, the SM is about to blow. Don't call the shuttles, we can fix it after it erupts. Stay away from the southern area for a while people. And remember, stay frosty!
